name: Game in Notebook
description:
The game is drawn in the notebook and digitized into the game on the PC. This is Game in notebook

This is a hardcore platformer in the style of games in a notebook. The first levels will be easy, but then it will be hot

Beta was created in just 2 hours

Controls

You can use WAD buttons or Arrows

The goal of the game

You have to pass all the levels to finish the level, you need to open the door. To open the door you need a key.

Key you can find in different places the door too. You have in the beginning of the level can be 1 or 2 directions

If direction 2, one direction key in another door. 
If the direction is one, it can be divided into 2

In some levels you can see the monsters, then know that to kill them/it is impossible to remove, they are like moving obstacles

What is the difference between the beta and the full version of the game?

The number of levels. In beta 10. In the full game (the information is hidden, because the full version is not ready yet)

What will be the price of the full game?

1$ or 2$
